definitions.text: nearest in space or position; immediately adjoining without intervening space
examples: the person sitting next to me
our rooms were side by side

definitions.text: having a common boundary or edge; abutting; touching
examples: Rhode Island has two bordering states; Massachusetts and Conncecticut
the side of Germany conterminous with France
Utah and the contiguous state of Idaho

definitions.text: near or close to but not necessarily touching
